name: Lunatech Ventures
overview:
Lunatech Ventures is an IT investment company looking for young and talented entrepreneurs who want to build remarkable companies.

They are seed investors, their main focus being Internet and Interactive media technologies. Their preference is for investment as equity (shareholding), this allows the investor and entrepreneur to share a goal - to create value for the company. They invest working capital, human resources, or a combination of both. They are willing to invest in pre-revenue companies - they may provide a companyâ€™s first working capital.
